abstract: AMC has ordered a second season of it’s new drama “The Killing,” which has tracked one murder case for 13 episodes.
snippet: AMC has ordered a second season of it’s new drama “The Killing,” which has tracked one murder case for 13 episodes.
lead_paragraph: 6:17 p.m. | Updated With some of the best reviews of the television season backing it, AMC’s new drama “The Killing” might have seemed a shoo-in for a second-season order.

headline.main: AMC Orders a Second Season of ‘The Killing’
